item.title: Melissa add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Charles Schultz
item.description: "<b>I</b> love mankind ... it's <b>people</b> I can't stand!!" -- Charles Schultz

item.title: Melissa add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Donald Miller
item.description: "It occurs to me it is not so much the aim of the devil to lure me with evil as it is to preoccupy me with the meaningless. " -- Donald Miller

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Waste not a day in vain digression; with resolute, courageous trust seek every possible impression and make it firmly your posession you'll then work on because you must." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
